block.p: FARMLAND INDUSTRIES, Kansas City, Mo., named Robert Honse, chief operating officer, to the post of president and chief executive. Mr. Honse succeeds H. D. Cleberg, who is retiring.

ILIFE.COM, North Palm Beach, Fla., named Elisabeth DeMarse president and chief executive at ilife.com, a gateway Web site, and bankrate.com, the company's personal finance site. She had been executive vice president for international operations at Hoover's Online.
FARMLAND INDUSTRIES, Kansas City, Mo., named Robert Honse, chief operating officer, to the post of president and chief executive. Mr. Honse succeeds H. D. Cleberg, who is retiring.

ILIFE.COM, North Palm Beach, Fla., named Elisabeth DeMarse president and chief executive at ilife.com, a gateway Web site, and bankrate.com, the company's personal finance site. She had been executive vice president for international operations at Hoover's Online.

THEBRAIN.COM, Santa Monica, Calif., a visual information management software maker, named Peter Fuchs chief executive, succeeding Don Block, who remains on the company's board. Mr. Fuchs had been managing partner for practice strategy at Andersen Consulting.
